title: There's Someone Else Laughing With Me...
body:
So I am playing a regular ranked game. It's my job to catch this Volibear, and don't let him recall. But as I stay on his trail, I keep spamming laugh for fun. But something weird happens after that. As I'm passing our blue, another voice starts laughing. It doesn't sound like Volibear, or ANY other champion in the game. It creeps me out to hear it, because it never happened again. I went back to the area to try summoning the mysterious voice again, but nothing happened. I couldn't explore all of the jungles, because they surrendered.

Forget my series, please tell me what just happened.

~~EDIT: It also happened yesterday. But every single time it happens, if I go to champion select, the sound of mastery points continuously plays during champion select.~~

EDIT: That was a patch bug I guess, it's not really a problem anymore

replies.body:
Very strange indeed! A possible teaser for the next champion? A new Event? The GP rework?

It's all a mystery at the moment!

Most likely a teaser for a champion, similar to how there were new marks added to Summoners Rift before Bard was released.

The most enticing theory I've heard is that it's [Tabu](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Tabu) (or a variation of him).
---------
The speculation starts with the Prehistoric Skins splash art:
http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Anivia_Splash_6.jpg

You'll notice that there are two figures in the foreground, one of which has a staff somewhat similar to Tabu's. While they're used to show the scale of a champion, we've seen this sort of thing before:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QTkAa0c_-4w/U798KAgCujI/AAAAAAAAMjA/pY57vs6nqMI/s1921/malphite-mecha-skin-splash-1920x1080.jpg

In Mecha Malphite's splash art, we see Ziggs and Heimer drawn in as a scale, even though they're low detail.

Skin Splash Arts have previewed champions before. Most notably, Vel'Koz was previewed in Creator Viktor's splash art four months before he was released.
http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/Creator-Viktor.jpg

------
Now, lets look at the hint given in the patch notes, shall we? I think it can be divided into two subjects, one part hinting about the laugh, and the other part hinting about who it's for.

The laugh is easy to piece together

>For those of you struggling to keep up in your games of League, we're always striving to ensure you won't be stuck up **the river** without a paddle. [...] Mope, and you mope alone - **laugh, and the world laughs with you**. Or so they say.

It's easy to see, since we already know what it is. What remains should, in theory, be hints about the new champion:

> And that about **encapsulates** the contents of this patch. [...] That said, **if conventional means don't work, be careful who you call when seeking help**; [...] there's all sorts of things out there, **preying on the wishes of desperate people**. 
>
> Boy that was **crypt**ic

Encapsulates seems too out of place with everything else to be a coincidence, although what it means I don't know. The rest sounds like a witch doctor, someone who's *unconventional* means you seek out after *conventional* options have failed, reserved for the most desperate situations.

The last one just sounds like a Riot pun if it is about Tabu, since they already put the nail in his coffin.

--------

With all that said, it's just a theory, and should be taken with several grains of salt. Fortunately, salt doesn't seem to be hard to find in League ;)
It's creeping me out too...
I forgot it was there in one of my games so when I spammed laugh for fun I jumped when something laughed back.
It's known, a teaser of some sort. For what, we will have to wait
I believe it's a tease for the GP rework

Sorry to be "That guy" but this aint true, first of all, yes a GP rework is coming in the near future but think about what you're saying: Ryze got a big rework and there wasn't a whole "HOLY SHIT RUNES ON THE WALL" before it was confirmed, second of all, I know GP is a pirate and all but why would he be underwater? Its obvious the voice is coming from UNDER THE RIVER, so unless GP is becoming a spooky ghost pirate this seems improbable, finally: it doesnt match up, sure the voice sounds similar but all of GP's laughs have a HAR and Pirate Rule #36 states that a pirate must yar when he hars, meaning this is either: A new champ, mob, or something else. I don't get why all of you think GP has become a river monster :/

> [{quoted}](name=Avian Dreams,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=bj27T6d3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-15T00:19:47.629+0000)
>
> Sorry to be "That guy" but this aint true, first of all, yes a GP rework is coming in the near future but think about what you're saying: Ryze got a big rework and there wasn't a whole "HOLY SHIT RUNES ON THE WALL" before it was confirmed, second of all, I know GP is a pirate and all but why would he be underwater? Its obvious the voice is coming from UNDER THE RIVER, so unless GP is becoming a spooky ghost pirate this seems improbable, finally: it doesnt match up, sure the voice sounds similar but all of GP's laughs have a HAR and Pirate Rule #36 states that a pirate must yar when he hars, meaning this is either: A new champ, mob, or something else. I don't get why all of you think GP has become a river monster :/

Yeah its a champ teaser.

It's important to note that the GP rework is much larger in scale than Ryze's and includes a visual update - This will probably entail a new VO and possibly even a Davy-Jones-esque redesign for our Pirate friend. 
That's why Gangplank cannot be completely counted out just yet.
Hmm...didn't think of this way, maybe a VO could be in the works but I find his voice ATM is fine, I still doubt it considering Pirate Rule #36
{{champion:96}} : "Terror coming... Daddy coming."

> [{quoted}](name=Azure KayZ,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=bj27T6d3,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-06-15T00:43:23.257+0000)
>
> {{champion:96}} : "Terror coming... Daddy coming."

But Kha'Zix came already

Yeah, I'm gonna go with Avian Dreams on this one and say it has absolutely nothing to do with GP. It sounds nothing like him at all. Sounds more like Nautilus than GP. Regardless, my money is on a new champ.
Seriously though its happened to me 3 times in the past 4 days
OOOOMG I thought i was the only one. Shits been phreaking me out lately.
The laugh comes exactly once per game if you laugh in the river.

Happens ~2 seconds after you laugh while being in the river.
Only once per match per player, though.

I know right , every time i go to the river and laugh there is a weird voice laughing with me , i thought it was {{champion:82}} laugh at first , but than the next game there was no mord , and  i kept laughing to hear it again but it didnt happen , gg riot x) so _weird _
i laughed as morde to hear it too, it is an easter egg that happens anywhere on the baron side of the map in the jungle ive found out. but you can only hear it once a game apparently.
it happened in the Drake side to me

If conventional means don't work, be careful who you call when seeking help; there's all sorts of things out there, preying on the wishes of desperate people. Mope, and you mope alone - laugh, and the world laughs with you.........or so they say.
